programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep923
programme.desc: Pups Save Alex's Feathery Friends / Pups Save a Puffy Mayor - The Paw Patrol must rescue Mr. Porter and reunite an ostrich family before the big birds get into big trouble. // During Mayor Goodway's fashion show, the Pups must save Farmer Al and Mayor Humdinger after a puffy shirt floats away with them.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Beaver Home / The Crew Fixes A Road - The power is out in Builder Cove! When the pups find out a beaver is to blame, they've got to build him a new home to bring the power back. // When Speed Meister damages the road ahead of the town helper parade, the pups work fast to repave the way.

programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Sandcastle Calamity / Owl-Ert - Steel upsets a family of sand crabs when he makes a huge sandcastle for Stu and Safia. // Kai rushes through a voice-recognition upgrade on Janice and she ends up mistaking the hoots of a baby owl as commands from Alex, making his gadgets go crazy.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Paddington And The Three Musketeers / Paddington And The Dinosaur Hunt - It's World Book Day and Paddington helps Mateo discover his favorite character to dress up as. // Paddington, Simi and Jonathan are on a dinosaur hunt on the island in the park, but dinosaurs don't exist any more, do they?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Apple Pie - Tiny Chef bakes apple pie for the big contest, and after an accident, has to think fast to come up with a new entry.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Pups Save the Parrot / Pups Save the Queen Bee - The PAW Patrol heads to the jungle to help their friend Carlos find his lost parrot, Mateo! // When the PAW Patrol discovers a beehive in Cap'n Turbot's lighthouse, Ryder and the pups must work together to find the bees a new home.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Pups Save an Elephant Family / Pups and the Mischievous Kittens - The pups' road trip through the savanna becomes a mission to reunite and rescue an elephant family! // To win the Spotless Town award, the PAW Patrol pups must save Adventure Bay from Mayer Humdinger's Kitten Catastrophe Crew!

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Lil' Kimchi King and Kween / Don't Go Miss Elky / Doctor Chipper - Turtle wants to win a contest but he's up against Honey Bear. // When Bossy thinks Miss Elky is planning to leave forever, he tries to convince her to stay. // Bossy Turtle and Roller helps Chipper face her fear of going to the doctor's.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Shadowland / Medievel Tides - Jealous of Baby Shark's popularity, Shadow rebrands the Wreck as his own personal amusement park. // When Baby Shark and friends are playing knights and royals, Vola wants to be more than just a princess.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Daddy Shack / Rocky-Bye - After a selfish fish takes over the putt-putt, Baby Shark and William must find a champion mini-golf player to defeat him. // Hank struggles to overcome his fears without the help of his pet rock, Rocky.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Three is a Magic Number / Off the Map - With the help of El Guardin, the crew solves the puzzle of their new headquarters in order to unlock a secret treasure. // The crew journey to the unknown corners of the ocean and discover a real-life Sea Monster who needs their help.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Sidekick Switcheroo - During a high seas scuffle, Kiko and Sir Butterscotch swap places!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep419
programme.desc: Mr Fox's Van - When Daddy Pig needs a new watch, Mr Fox finds three grandfather clocks in the back of his van. Three clocks are much better than one. Mr Fox has everything in his van even a chicken!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep420
programme.desc: Chloe's Big Friends - Peppa and George go to play with Cousin Chloe and her friends, but the older children don't want to play any "baby" games.

programme.title: Kinderwood S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Luplup's Big Sister / Clean Up Round Up / It's About Time - Fifi worries that Luplup will outgrow her. // When a mess keeps Olive from playing cowgirl, she figures out how to clean AND wrangle simultaneously. / Luplup is so anxious for Fuzzbone to dry he speeds up time, only to discover the value of patience.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep202
programme.desc: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! - The dazzling return to the world's screens of the most pop family of them all! BARBAPAPA - One big happy family! Routine does not exist for the Barbapapas: each day is a merry adventure full of surprises!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S04 Ep415
programme.desc: The Flying Lion - Blaze and AJ are excited to play with their new friend Roarian, the Flying Lion! But when Roarian loses his magical sunstone, he turns into a statue! Now it's up to Blaze and AJ to find the sunstone and restore Roarian's powers!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S04 Ep417
programme.desc: Royal Rescue - A visit to the King's castle goes awry when the King accidentally catapults himself far, far away! To bring him home, Blaze, AJ and the King's adorable pet dragon Zeek must transform into knights in shining armor!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep915
programme.desc: Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf - When a baby T-Rex gets lost, Ryder and the pups go on a daring mission to the Dino Wilds to help find him. // When Everest joins the Paw Patrol for a visit to the jungle, she makes friends with a clumsy elephant calf and then must help rescue him.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep921
programme.desc: Pups Save a Flamingo Dancer / Pups Save a Mayor and Her Mini - The Paw Patrol searches for Julia, Julius and a flamingo when they go missing from a dance contest. // The Paw Patrol comes to the rescue when Mayor Goodway and her niece Julia get stuck on a runaway art installation.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Daddy Shack / Rocky-Bye - After a selfish fish takes over the putt-putt, Baby Shark and William must find a champion mini-golf player to defeat him. // Hank struggles to overcome his fears without the help of his pet rock, Rocky.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Captain Kelp - As Super Shark and Captain Kelp, Baby Shark and William set out to save playtime-but is Captain Kelp just a sidekick?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep203
programme.desc: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! - The dazzling return to the world's screens of the most pop family of them all! BARBAPAPA - One big happy family! Routine does not exist for the Barbapapas: each day is a merry adventure full of surprises!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Paddington's Goo Monster / Paddington's Apple Pip Adventure - Paddington makes Goo but can he keep his promise to not make a mess when thngs get out of control? // Paddington and Simi go on a magical journey into the human body to see if an apple pip grows into a tree if you swallow one.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep414
programme.desc: The Wizard of Skidoo - Welcome to the wonderful world of Skidooland! As we head down the stripey brick road on our quest to get home, we'll meet Rainbow Puppy the Kind Witch, Tinbox, and even the Wizard of Skidoo himself- Steve!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Popcorn Caf / The Crew Fixes A Slippery Mess - Rubble & Crew switch to cleanup mode when construction on Caf Carl's new popcorn restaurant pops out of control. // A soapy accident causes slippery mayhem all over Builder Cove. Can the pups clean it up in time for Mayor Greatway's big jump?

programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Going Off With A Bang / Talent For Trouble - Steel and the Deer Squad want to organise a surprise party for Professor Scratch's birthday but the twins almost ruin the party. // To win the big talent show, Stu and Safia get Professor Scratch to programme Dinobot to obey their every command.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Three King's Day - It's Three Kings Day and Larimar is abuzz with holiday cheer! But when Bonnie Bones kidnaps a camel belonging to one of the Three Kings, it's up to Santiago and his crew to stop Bonnie from ruining the holiday.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Shadowland / Medievel Tides - Jealous of Baby Shark's popularity, Shadow rebrands the Wreck as his own personal amusement park. // When Baby Shark and friends are playing knights and royals, Vola wants to be more than just a princess.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Birthdaze / Squid N' Playl / Board to Tears - Bossy comes up with a plan to celebrate his birthday every day. // Bossy and Turtle invite Saddiq to take part in International Bestie Day traditions. // When Turtle gets a new skateboard, he's too scared to use it when Bossy has an accident.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep922
programme.desc: Pups Save the Wind Trekkers / Pups Save a Trophy - When Mayor Goodway and Chickaletta get trapped inside a mesa, it's up to the Paw Patrol and a little snake to rescue them. // When Humdinger's mom Helga loses her son's phony trophy, the Paw Patrol have to rescue her and the trophy.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep811
programme.desc: Pups Save A Royal Painting - Sweetie steals a painting of the Princess and attempts to replace it with one of herself.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep106
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Skate Park / The Crew Builds A Tunnel - The Crew has a mishap while building a skatepark. // The Crew helps a pop star get her tour bus to town.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Mr Dinosaur is Lost - George's favourite toy is Mr.Dinosaur. One day Mr.Dinosaur gets stuck up a tree and George thinks he is lost, so Peppa helps George find him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep416
programme.desc: Shake, Rattle and Bang - Madame Gazelle gives the class a music lesson. There's lots of crashing and banging at first, but it's not long before the grown-ups visit and lay down some notes of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep417
programme.desc: Champion Daddy Pig - Daddy Pig loses his title as Champion Puddle Jumper during the Daddi-Olympics, so everyone helps him train to win it back at the Daddi-Olympics.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep418
programme.desc: Chatterbox - Peppa Pig talks far too much. Or at least so Suzy thinks. In response, Peppa decides that she is never going to talk, ever again. But this does not last for very long at all.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep133
programme.desc: Froga's Choice - Froga can't decide which boots to wear for today's group photo with her friends. Anna, Ron, and Bubu try to help her decide, but it makes her decision-making more difficult!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep134
programme.desc: The Great Friendship Show - Anna and her friends write a poem. Bubu prefers to paint. And the friends do so too. Froga is not so keen on painting, she creates a full-on choreography that Christopher finds hard, he prefers juggling. For Ron, it's poetry.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep413
programme.desc: Blue's New Pet - It's campaign hamster versus campaign goldfish as the house votes on a new pet! When it's a tie, we play Blue's Clues to figure out who will cast the last (and deciding!) vote.

programme.desc: Pups Save Alex's Feathery Friends / Pups Save a Puffy Mayor - The Paw Patrol must rescue Mr. Porter and reunite an ostrich family before the big birds get into big trouble. // During Mayor Goodway's fashion show, the Pups must save Farmer Al and Mayor Humdinger after a puffy shirt floats away with them.

programme.desc: Apple Pie - Tiny Chef bakes apple pie for the big contest, and after an accident, has to think fast to come up with a new entry.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep81
programme.desc: Give It Back - Tinky Winky and Dipsy both want a go with Tinky Winky's bag and start to squabble. The Noo-noo sucks up the bag and only gives it back when Tinky Winky and Dipsy are ready to share.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Coat - Dee encourages a friend to say 'coat' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see all different types of coat - a snowy coat, a glowy coat and even a goat in a coat!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Hooper's Big Day Out - Hooper has planned a beach day for his friends. Phoebe is worried that Hooper might need help, so she tries to organise the day for him.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Gills - Messy, a monster, explores science questions that children ask about the world around us. Messy wants to know how his goldfish friend can stay underwater for so long. He goes to OKIDO to find out.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep69
programme.desc: Waiting Games - When Gran tells Monty that good things come to those who wait, he wonders how it could possibly be better to wait for something than to have it right away.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep29
programme.desc: The Creek - Bored of the local playground, Dad and the kids go out bushwalking on a journey to their local creek. Cast out of her comfort zone, Bluey's eyes are opened to the beauty of the natural world.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep11
programme.desc: The Pottery Badge - Duggee is having a lovely cup of tea in his favourite cup when Roly surprises him with a very loud peek-a-boo! It is so loud that Duggee jumps and drops his cup which shatters into pieces.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep10
programme.desc: The Honey Badge - Duggee's made some delicious pancakes, but the clubhouse is out of honey. Time for the bees to get busy!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep9
programme.desc: The Tadpole Badge - Duggee has made a beautiful rock pool. The Squirrels spot the strangest things - dots with tails, wriggling around. What on earth are they? They are baby frogs - tadpoles!

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep26
programme.desc: Nomads, Mongolia - Glitch offends some nomads in Mongolia, so it's down to the Go Jetters to take the reins.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep25
programme.desc: Gliding, Argentina - Glitch gatecrashes an academy gliding test, causing calamity in the skies over Argentina.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep52
programme.desc: Verandah Santa (Christmas Episode) - It's Christmas Eve and Dad and the kids are taking turns pretending to be Santa! But when Socks nips Bluey, and she refuses to leave her a present, they must all learn the true meaning of being good for Christmas.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep27
programme.desc: The Snow Po - The Kid Po have built a big and impressive Snow Po, but it keeps on blowing over. Can Team Tinpo help?

programme.title: My World Kitchen S4 Ep15
programme.desc: Dougie's Essex Yule Log (Christmas) - Dougie is making a festive yule log. His yummy chocolate recipe with redcurrants is a Christmas classic. He also has a themed table gift for all his friends to enjoy.

programme.title: My Pet and Me Winter Special: Arctic Animals S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Arctic Animals - We visit the reindeer of Karasjok, go to the Arctic Wildlife Park to meet Norway's indigenous animals, and see the Finnmarksvidda mountain plateau and the Sapmi Park too!

programme.title: Swashbuckle S5 Ep13
programme.desc: Christmas Rules - Everybody is looking forward to Christmas on the Scarlet Squid.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep26
programme.desc: The Tinsel Badge - It's nearly Christmas, so while Duggee wraps presents to go under the tree he asks the Squirrels if they want to decorate the clubhouse.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep31
programme.desc: The Snowman Badge - The Squirrels are playing outside in the snow and decide to build a jolly-looking snowman. But when the punky penguins turn up, the fun REALLY begins!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep32
programme.desc: The Christmas Badge - Duggee's old friend Clarence has lost his Christmas cheer, so the Squirrels try and inspire him by showing what they enjoy most about Christmas.

programme.desc: - A special festive edition of the colourful animation series packed with comedy, teamwork, thrilling action, great gadgets, awesome sights and funky facts about brand new places.

programme.desc: Merry Winter Wish - It's the Winter Holidays and Thomas is given the special job of delivering the Star of Knapford to Knapford Station.

programme.desc: Seacow Snow Trail - Sarah and Duck have received some Christmas Presents and are keen to find out who delivered them.

programme.title: The Homes That Built Australia Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Cyclones, floods, droughts; the all-mighty forces of nature devastate our homes and lives, showing how we must design and work with the land - or ignore it at our own peril.

programme.title: Landline Summer Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - This summer, we look back at some of the best Landline stories from 2023. Fighting chemical spray drift in the cotton industry; plus growing more rice using less water.

programme.title: The Pacific: Summer Special Ep18
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - A look back at some of our favourite stories from the Pacific. We go to Solomon Islands where the legacy of WWII is still felt. Plus we hear from two Pacific music legends Jean Gabilou and American Idol winner Iam Tongi.

programme.title: ABC News Afternoons Ep13
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - The day's top stories and the latest from ABC News on Christmas Day. Presented by Ros Childs.

programme.title: News Breakfast: Christmas Cracker Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Spend Christmas with your favourite breakfast TV family. Michael Rowland, Lisa Millar, Tony Armstrong, Bridget Brennan and Nate Byrne are joined by some of our regular contributors and special guests for some festive cheer.

programme.title: ABC News on Christmas Day Ep256
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - The day's top stories and the latest from ABC News on Christmas Day. Presented by Ros Childs.

programme.title: The World In 2023 Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - From scientific breakthroughs and stories of survival, to conflict and political upheaval, 2023 was a year like no other. Beverley O'Connor looks back at the big international news stories which shaped The World in 2023.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep10
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Peter Maddison meets Edd and Amanda Williams from Steels Creek in Victoria, who plan to build a robust concrete bunker that would be embedded in the landscape and safe from bushfires.

programme.title: Camel Capers Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - One New South Wales family has a 3 generation connection to camels. Turning 15 is a big deal for Anna Cannard, allowing her to race her three pet camels, and fueling her dreams to turn pro.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep256
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - The day's top stories and the latest from ABC News on Christmas Day. Presented by Ros Childs.

programme.title: Back Roads Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 9 - Heather Ewart visits the Quilpie shire in outback Queensland. With an average age of under 40, residents have transformed this former Opalopolis into a vibrant community, with a little help from Australia's biggest dinosaur.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight Ep256
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - The day's top stories and the latest from ABC News on Christmas Day. Presented by Herlyn Kaur.

programme.title: Australian Story Ep15
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Mick and Jamie bonded over coding as teenagers. Now their brilliant tech idea is transforming lives around the world. Their software could have made them rich but instead they've kept it free to help the blind community.

programme.title: A Sunburnt Christmas
programme.desc: A family living on an outback farm that has seen hard times suspect there won't be much Christmas joy this year, but when a man dressed as Santa crashes a van of toys onto their property, their world is turned upside down.

programme.title: The World In 2023 Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - From scientific breakthroughs and stories of survival, to conflict and political upheaval, 2023 was a year like no other. Beverley O'Connor looks back at the big international news stories which shaped The World in 2023.

programme.title: Alone Australia Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - After ten days in the Tasmanian wilderness, just five participants remain. Having survived the settling in period, each is now focussed on their own strategies, which they hope will see them outstay the others.

programme.title: Back Roads Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 9 - Heather Ewart visits the Quilpie shire in outback Queensland. With an average age of under 40, residents have transformed this former Opalopolis into a vibrant community, with a little help from Australia's biggest dinosaur.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep256
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - The day's top stories and the latest from ABC News on Christmas Day. Presented by Herlyn Kaur.

programme.title: Aussie Bull Catchers Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - The Cooks double down on their investment with a helicopter. Kurt Hammar's son Kodi leaves school to become a bull catcher. After a nasty spider bite and medical help miles away, Clarry's worker resorts to an old bush remedy.

programme.title: Built To Survive Ep9
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Phil Breslin journeys down Australia's river system by kayak, all the way from the rocky rapids to the wide brown estuaries. Phil encounters a duc-billed platypus, a long-finned eel and a bull shark.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep10
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Peter Maddison meets Edd and Amanda Williams from Steels Creek in Victoria, who plan to build a robust concrete bunker that would be embedded in the landscape and safe from bushfires.

programme.title: Chopsticks Or Fork? Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - In 2019, the Black Summer bushfires swept through Malua Bay and destroyed Raymond's Chinese Restaurant. Ten months later, it rose from the ashes with a sleek new look, and with Raymond's daughter Emily now at the helm.

programme.title: The World In 2023 Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - From scientific breakthroughs and stories of survival, to conflict and political upheaval, 2023 was a year like no other. Beverley O'Connor looks back at the big international news stories which shaped The World in 2023.

programme.title: Australian Story Ep15
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Mick and Jamie bonded over coding as teenagers. Now their brilliant tech idea is transforming lives around the world. Their software could have made them rich but instead they've kept it free to help the blind community.

programme.title: News Breakfast: Christmas Cracker Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - A second helping of festive frivolity as the News Breakfast team bring you more seasonal cheer and Christmas Spirit with a special for the holiday season.

programme.title: Back Roads Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 9 - Heather Ewart visits the Quilpie shire in outback Queensland. With an average age of under 40, residents have transformed this former Opalopolis into a vibrant community, with a little help from Australia's biggest dinosaur.

programme.title: Pacific Upside
programme.desc: Melissa Maykin uncovers the stories of people across the Pacific region, from Tonga to Timor-Leste, driving positive change in their communities, celebrating resilience, creativity and friendship as locals tackle challenges.

programme.title: Landline: Asia Pacific Special Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - In Fiji, Landline reports on the growth in beekeeping and the management of varroa mite, plus the surge in kava farming and new products for the export market.

programme.title: Back Roads Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 9 - Foodie and farmer Paul West packs his surfboard for a Back Roads visit to tiny Marrawah in northwest Tasmania for the legendary West Coast Classic: three days of big swells, blowing gales and woolly beanies.

programme.title: News Breakfast Ep257
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Be the first to know the latest overnight developments, breaking news and the top stories this morning. Emma Rebellato and Catherine Murphy bring you news and interviews, Rani Hayman with sport and Nate Byrne with weather.

programme.title: News Breakfast: Christmas Cracker Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Spend Christmas with your favourite breakfast TV family. Michael Rowland, Lisa Millar, Tony Armstrong, Bridget Brennan and Nate Byrne are joined by some of our regular contributors and special guests for some festive cheer.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings Ep257
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - When big stories break, turn to Casey Briggs in the morning to bring you what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has more reporters in more places, serving and connecting communities and telling your stories.

programme.title: Back Roads: Great Australian Pubs Special Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 9 - In this special 100th episode of Back Roads, Heather Ewart looks at The Great Australian Pub. Our very own unique style of watering hole, the humble pub sits at the heart of many communities.

programme.title: Australian Story Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Love, loss and sailing the world solo: Jessica Watson takes us inside her amazing voyage as a teenage sailor, speaks about the grief of losing her partner, and a new feature film which has thrust her back into the spotlight.

programme.title: Sydney to Hobart Yacht Race Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Live coverage of the Sydney to Hobart Yacht Race start from Sydney Harbour, with days of world class racing down the south coast of NSW and across the Tasman Sea to Hobart.

programme.title: Built To Survive Ep9
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Phil Breslin journeys down Australia's river system by kayak, all the way from the rocky rapids to the wide brown estuaries. Phil encounters a duc-billed platypus, a long-finned eel and a bull shark.

programme.title: Aussie Bull Catchers Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - The Cooks double down on their investment with a helicopter. Kurt Hammar's son Kodi leaves school to become a bull catcher. After a nasty spider bite and medical help miles away, Clarry's worker resorts to an old bush remedy.

programme.title: What Broke The Rental Market?
programme.desc: As the cost of living goes up, nothing looms larger in our budgets than the roof over our heads. Casey Briggs looks at what an average wage gets you in some of the world's big cities, and lessons for our rental crisis.

programme.title: ABC News Afternoons Ep14
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Kamin Gock.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep257
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Kamin Gock brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: Regional Roundup Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - More of our favourite regional stories from 2023. How one NSW farmer turned big floods into big business, a cosmic spectacle that lit up southern skies, and new contender for man's best friend - a goat that thinks it's a dog.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep1

programme.title: Belonging(s) Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - We check the shards from rice bowls dated back to the 1870s when Chinese cookshops dotted the goldfields, and trace how early Chinese restaurants helped create the richness of contemporary Asian Australian cuisine.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC279DiazvsFerguson
programme.desc: UFC 279 was headlined by a bout between two UFC legends and Ultimate Fighter winners: Nate Diaz and Tony El Cucuy Ferguson. Plus, Khamzat Chimaev faced rival Kevin Holland. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep905AdesanyavsVettori2
programme.desc: Undefeated in the UFC at 185 pounds, reigning middleweight champion Israel Adesanya defends his title in a rematch against the The Italian Dream Marvin Vettori at UFC 263. See both men train and prepare to fight for UFC middleweight gold.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC280OliveiravsMakhachev
programme.desc: UFC 280 featured a battle for the vacant lightweight title between former champion Charles Oliveira and Islam Makhachev. Plus, Aljamain Sterling defended his bantamweight belt against TJ Dillashaw. See the whole main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep17
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: UFC 295: ProchÃ¡zka vs. Pereira
programme.desc: Prelims - The Worlds Most Famous Arena is the perfect setting for an epic championship doubleheader on November 12, as UFC celebrates its 30th anniversary in Madison Square Garden. In the explosive UFC 295 main event, Jiri Prochazka attempts to regain his 205-pound crown against former middleweight king Alex Pereira in a bout fans have been waiting for. Plus, its another Fight of the Year candidate in the co-main event when Russian powerhouse Sergei Pavlovich takes on British banger Tom Aspinall for the interim UFC heavyweight title.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Almeida vs. Lewis
programme.desc: Prelims - On October 21, the UFC returns to Abu Dhabi, where two of the top fighters in the world, pound for pound, will meet again as Islam Makhachev defends his lightweight title against featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski in the main event of UFC 294 at Etihad Arena. In February, the pair met for the first time, engaging in a Fight of the Year candidate that left fans demanding a rematch. Now Makhachev, who has won 12 straight, will attempt to make it two in a row over the Aussie star, who is hungry to even the score with the 155-pound king. Plus, middleweight sensation Khamzat Chimaev welcomes former welterweight champion Kamaru Usman to the division in a fight with serious title implications at 185 pounds

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Allen vs. Craig
programme.desc: Prelims - In a wide-open middleweight division, every fight is an important one, and on November 18, 185-pound contenders Brendan Allen and Paul Craig collide in a UFC Fight Night main event at the APEX in Las Vegas that will set up a huge 2024 campaign for the winner. Winner of five straight with four finishes and a pair of Performance of the Night bonuses, Allen is surging at the perfect time for this fall matchup with Craig, the Scottish submission machine, who announced his arrival to the division in July with an impressive stoppage of Andre Muniz
